originalText.text: My charger tip broke off while still inserted in my phone. Paul was super helpful and had it out in 2 minutes. Because he did it so fast he gave me a discount on what they would normally charge ($25 instead of their usual min $30) and also did a complimentary thorough cleaning of all the nooks and crannies of my phone to help give my money‚Äôs worth. Super friendly, got my phone back better than before!

originalText.text: I've been to plenty of ubreakifix before, this was by far the best experience because of their agent Paul. Really nice guy that goes above and beyond and genuinely wants to help you. So patient and willing to get everything fixed and sorted out for you. Values customer service and it is felt. What a refreshing experience just to go get a phone fixed! Love interacting with people such as him because typically these experiences are frustrating and unpleasant.

originalText.text: Paul was an absolute pleasure to work with. He fixed my phone in no time and truly provided me with the best service. You can tell he truly loves what he does and I will be coming back for any repairs needed and recommending everyone I know to stop by and ask for him!

originalText.text: This place is a blessing. Honestly, I don't know what I would do if we did not have this phone location at our neighborhood. I dropped off an iPhone 13 Pro for a repair and was quoted a time of 2 hours, and they got it done in 30 minutes! I believe the technicians name was Paul, he's very handsome. Love his cute beard. He reminds me of my late husband.
